description: "Created by the U.S. Army during the Spanish-American War, this reconnaissance map of a small area south of Manila features Spanish (red) and American (blue) trenches, as well as roads, buildings and ground conditions (firm ground, swamps, bamboo)."
title: "Copy   of   map   furnished   to   commanding   officers,   2nd   Brig.,   2nd   Div.,   8th   Army   Corps,   on   August   12,   1898"
